languages.text: {n}Иокаста принимает на себя град ваших ударов стоически стиснув зубы. Ни единого звука не вырывается из ее рта, даже когда стальной набалдашник ломает ей нос и разбивает губу. Когда вы заканчиваете, она, не теряя военной выправки, принимает булаву обратно и кланяется.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: анимация мили удар — игрок бьет Зауэрбэк
анимация мили удар — игрок бьет Зауэрбэк

languages.text: {n}Sauerback clenches her teeth through every one of your blows. Not a single sound escapes her throat, not even when the maul's steel head breaks her nose and splits open her lips. After you finish, she receives her weapon back and bows, all the while maintaining the same impeccable bearing.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Иокаста принимает на себя град ваших ударов стоически стиснув зубы. Ни единого звука не вырывается из ее рта, даже когда стальной набалдашник ломает ей нос и разбивает губу. Когда вы заканчиваете, она, не теряя военной выправки, принимает булаву обратно и кланяется.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback takes your every blow with clenched teeth. She does not make a sound, not even when the steel maul head breaks her nose and bloodies her lips. Once you are finished, she receives her weapon back and bows, still maintaining her impeccable bearing.{/n}

{n}Sauerback takes your every blow with clenched teeth. She does not make a sound, not even when the steel maul head breaks her nose and bloodies her lips. Once you are finished, she receives her weapon back and bows, still maintaining her impeccable bearing.{/n}

{n}Sauerback clenches her teeth through every one of your blows. Not a single sound escaper her throat, not even when the maul's steel head breaks her nose and splits open her lips. After you finish, she receives her weapon back and bows, all the while maintaining the same impeccable bearing.{/n}

{n}Sauerback clenches her teeth through every one of your blows. Not a single sound escapes her throat, not even when the maul's steel head breaks her nose and splits open her lips. After you finish, she receives her weapon back and bows, all the while maintaining the same impeccable bearing.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sauerback aprieta los dientes mientras soporta cada uno de tus golpes. Ni un sonido escapa de su garganta, ni siquiera cuando la maza de acero rompe su nariz y abre sus labios. Cuando terminas, recoge su arma y te hace una reverencia, sin abandonar en ningún momento su postura impecable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback clenches her teeth through every one of your blows. Not a single sound escapes her throat, not even when the maul's steel head breaks her nose and splits open her lips. After you finish, she receives her weapon back and bows, all the while maintaining the same impeccable bearing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback aprieta los dientes mientras soporta cada uno de tus golpes. Ni un sonido escapa de su garganta, ni siquiera cuando la maza de acero rompe su nariz y abre sus labios. Cuando terminas, recoge su arma y te hace una reverencia, sin abandonar en ningún momento su postura impecable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ザウアーバックはあなたの下す一撃一撃に歯を食いしばる。モールの鋼鉄のヘッドが鼻をへし折り、唇を裂いても、彼女の喉からは声ひとつ漏れない。仕置きが終わった後、彼女は武器を受け取って頭を下げる。その間も、非の打ちどころのない態度は変わらなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback clenches her teeth through every one of your blows. Not a single sound escapes her throat, not even when the maul's steel head breaks her nose and splits open her lips. After you finish, she receives her weapon back and bows, all the while maintaining the same impeccable bearing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ザウアーバックはあなたの下す一撃一撃に歯を食いしばる。モールの鋼鉄のヘッドが鼻をへし折り、唇を裂いても、彼女の喉からは声ひとつ漏れない。仕置きが終わった後、彼女は武器を受け取って頭を下げる。その間も、非の打ちどころのない態度は変わらなかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克咬紧牙关，忍受着你的次次锤击。即便是锤子的钢头砸破了她的鼻梁，撕裂了她的嘴唇，她也没有发出任何声音。惩处结束之后，她取回了她的武器，保持着无可挑剔的姿态，向你深鞠一躬。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback clenches her teeth through every one of your blows. Not a single sound escapes her throat, not even when the maul's steel head breaks her nose and splits open her lips. After you finish, she receives her weapon back and bows, all the while maintaining the same impeccable bearing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}苏尔贝克咬紧牙关，忍受着你的次次锤击。即便是锤子的钢头砸破了她的鼻梁，撕裂了她的嘴唇，她也没有发出任何声音。惩处结束之后，她取回了她的武器，保持着无可挑剔的姿态，向你深鞠一躬。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sauerback beißt bei jedem deiner Hiebe die Zähne zusammen. Kein Laut entringt sich ihrer Kehle, nicht einmal, als der stählerne Kopf des Streitkolbens ihr die Nase bricht und die Lippen aufplatzen lässt. Nachdem du aufgehört hast, erhält sie ihre Waffe zurück und verbeugt sich, während sie die ganze Zeit ihre tadellose Haltung beibehält.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback clenches her teeth through every one of your blows. Not a single sound escapes her throat, not even when the maul's steel head breaks her nose and splits open her lips. After you finish, she receives her weapon back and bows, all the while maintaining the same impeccable bearing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback beißt bei jedem deiner Hiebe die Zähne zusammen. Kein Laut entringt sich ihrer Kehle, nicht einmal, als der stählerne Kopf des Streitkolbens ihr die Nase bricht und die Lippen aufplatzen lässt. Nachdem du aufgehört hast, erhält sie ihre Waffe zurück und verbeugt sich, während sie die ganze Zeit ihre tadellose Haltung beibehält.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sauerback serre un peu plus les dents à chaque coup qui atterrit sur sa chair, pourtant, aucun son ne s'échappe de sa gorge, même lorsque la tête d'acier de la masse vient briser son nez et fendre ses lèvres. Lorsque vous avez terminé, elle reprend son arme et s'incline sans se départir de son maintien irréprochable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback clenches her teeth through every one of your blows. Not a single sound escapes her throat, not even when the maul's steel head breaks her nose and splits open her lips. After you finish, she receives her weapon back and bows, all the while maintaining the same impeccable bearing.{/n}

Lorsque vous avez terminé, elle reprend son arme et s'incline sans se départir de son maintien irréprochable.{/n}
